items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 8)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 9!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 10 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 3!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 40 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 9.

items.checkin_comment: Nice and juicy. I taste banana

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 50 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 11!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 400 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 81! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 55 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 12!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 80 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 17.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 15 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 3!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 20 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.checkin_comment: Tasty, slightly bitter, yet lacking a flavor

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 160 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 33!

items.checkin_comment: Good juicy IPA would buy again

user.bio: I am drunk and don’t wanna go home
“I drink to make other people interesting.”
Ticking off pubs and discovering new ales. Also on Cask Marque. Instagram - findmeinthepub2022
user.location: Stevenage, UK - supports LOSC & Winnipeg Jets, Stevenage FC
